Key Match Events: Alek Thomas hit a pinch-hit game-tying home run in the bottom of the 8th inning
Gabriel Moreno drove in the go-ahead run with a single in the bottom of the 8th inning
Paul Sewald recorded the save in the top of the 9th inning to even the series
Post-Match Reflections: Torey Lovullo emphasized the importance of maintaining focus and competitive edge for the rest of the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a 'bullpen game' for the Diamondbacks
The Phillies used eight pitchers, but did not use starter Cristopher Sanchez as an opener
Others: The Diamondbacks scored an unearned run in the bottom of the 3rd inning due to a throwing error by Alec Bohm
The Phillies took the lead in the top of the 6th inning, but the Diamondbacks chipped away at it to eventually take the lead in the bottom of the 8th inning
